AVSEC Circular No. - 08/2016
Subject: To access the airport ferry vehicle up to tarmac area of airports in favour of Shri
Shatrughan Sinha, Hon'ble Member of Parliament on medical grounds - reg.
Reference BCAS Circular No. 08/2015 dated 22/07/2015
on the subject cited above.
2.
Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Hon'ble Member of Parliament is permitted the facility of airport
ferry vehicle, on medical grounds, from airport terminal to the aircraft and vice-versa at all those
airports where such facility exists, for a further period of one year, i.e. up to 30.06.2017.
